Section.Catchline: Requirement for instruction on human immunodeficiency virus and acquired immune deficiency syndrome.

SectionBody.Text: The board shall require, as a condition of granting a license under this part, that an applicant making initial application for licensure complete an education course acceptable to the board on human immunodeficiency virus and acquired immune deficiency syndrome. An applicant who has not taken a course at the time of licensure shall, upon submission of an affidavit showing good cause, be allowed 6 months to complete this requirement.
